Alright here's how it is, there is no virus, stop crying, all cracks show up on virus scanners as viruses, just deal with it, you aren't at risk unless you're downloading cracks from an extremely sketchy source in which case it would be your own stupidity, but I've been using the pirate bay for a LONG time and never once found an infected file, don't worry too much -_- 

Secondly thank you to the Anon. who uploaded this, great speed for dl, great game, (I prefer the first one though)  I would recommend this torrent to anybody who wants the game, good torrent, It's clean so again don't cry when your virus scanner says it's a trojan 5/5.
